news.title: React Infinite Scroll Tutorial: With and Without a Library
news.description: Infinite scroll is a modern web & application design concept that loads content continuously as the user scrolling down the page. It changes the function of pagination.

news.title: React App with Tailwind CSS / Emotion / Twin Macro
news.description: I'll explain how install and configure Tailwind CSS / Emotion and twin.macro in a Single Project of React to improve the way we use styles in our projects.

news.title: Currying in JavaScript
news.description: Currying is a process in functional programming in which we can transform a function with multiple arguments into a sequence of nesting functions. It returns a new function that expects the next argument inline.
